meanings.sent1: She was quitting her piano lessons.
meanings.sent2: He was quitting his bad habit of biting his nails.
meanings.sent3: After many failed attempts, she was finally quitting her quest to learn how to juggle.
meanings.sent4: The engine was quitting after running non-stop for hours.
meanings.sent5: The tired runner was quitting the race halfway through.

meanings.definition: To resign from a job or position
meanings.sent1: He was quitting his job at the factory.
meanings.sent2: She was quitting her role as team captain.
meanings.sent3: The clown was quitting his job to become a professional juggler.
meanings.sent4: The actor was quitting the play due to creative differences.
meanings.sent5: The tired employee was quitting his stressful job for a more relaxed one.

meanings.sent1: They were quitting the game after losing multiple rounds.
meanings.sent2: He was quitting his argument when he realized he was wrong.
meanings.sent3: The cat was quitting trying to catch the elusive laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The team was quitting their plan when they encountered unexpected obstacles.
meanings.sent5: She was quitting her dream of becoming a professional singer after facing harsh criticism.
